entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Osoyoos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Osoyoos 09:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to near valley bottom after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
